alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rapides Parish through 400 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boyce. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Boyce, Hineston, Lena, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Lecompte, Libuse, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Flatwoods, Otis, Elmer, Kingsville, Sieper, Poland, Kolin and Gardner. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 68 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
